comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: Robert Tait McKenzie (May 26, 1867 – April 28, 1938) was a Canadian-born American sculptor, Scouter, scholar-athlete, surgeon, soldier, and physical educator. Born in Ramsay Township, Lanark County, Ontario, he resided in Philadelphia, and worked with Lord Robert Baden-Powell, founder of Scouting. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/R._Tait_McKenzie
